nycTheatreExcerpt: : "Here, the playwright has the enormous help of Hecht, who delivers one of this year's most riveting performances...Whatever your views on childhood vaccines may be, Hecht forces you to reconsider those ideas right or wrong."

keyPhrases.quote: Hecht forces you to reconsider those ideas right or wrong.
